website_summaries.verdict: Loaded with expectations, the JB Elite IV from Asics hasn’t disappointed the brand’s loyal fans. The shoe is highly praised as a comfortable and sturdy wrestling shoe that also comes at a reasonable price. However, people with larger foot dimensions may have trouble with the shoe’s somewhat tight fit.
pros: Plenty of buyers agree that the JB Elite IV is a well-made wrestling shoe that comes at a fair price
The trainer has received many positive marks for its grippy outsole
According to multiple reviews, its split-sole construction allows for ample flexibility and a wide range of motion
Some wrestlers have commented on the shoe’s optimal ankle support
Customers agree across the board that the product has a very appealing style and color options
cons: A good number of purchasers complain about the shoe’s tight fit which may not suit people with wider feet
Several people have been put off by the visible glue that attaches the upper to the sole

customer_reviews.title: Size adjustments big time.  Read, accurate review........
customer_reviews.text: If you're a woman buying this product, treat it as any other shoe purchase. You do not have to adjust the size. If you're a 9, buy a 9. If you're a 10 buy a 10. This is sized for women already. Guys you have to go up 2 sizes then what you really are. So if you're a 9 buy a 11. 10 buy a 12. This is an accurate review. Why the seller doesn't just say that up front, I have no idea, it would safe a lot of irritation from the customers.
customer_reviews.author: SharonH

customer_reviews.title: Kind of in love with these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too excited about the look of these shoes when I ordered, but they are amazing. The fit was spot on (which wasn't the case with the asics agressors I tried), I am a women's size 9 and the 7.5 fit my kind of wide foot just as they should for my sport. I can't wait to deadlift in them, I am pretty sure I am going to hit a PR in these shoes the next time I attempt a max.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hill

customer_reviews.title: He’s Happy. I’m Happy. We’ll Be Back.
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my middle school wrestling son. After reading a lot of the reviews, I ordered a whole size up. They are a good tight fit. My son doesn’t have a wide foot so I can’t speak to that. These are his favorite wrestling shoes to date and I think that they will last the season easily (I expect him to grow out of them and we will repeat this process again next year). It’s nice that options are available that go with his school colors.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie1201

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute Deadlift shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for deadlift practice! And also because this type of shoe is accepted when i do power-lift meets. Cute, comfy and stable! I did go up a half size. I wear a size 8 womens and the shoe is a bit narrow, so size up a half size. 8.5 fits perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: hart

customer_reviews.title: Run a size too small, slow to arrive
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful but took 3 weeks to arrive and are smaller than expected. I'm a female and wear size 7.5 in women's....ordered size 6 of these shoes and they are too small! I'm conflicted if i should just wear the too small shoes because season will be over by the time larger replacements get here 👎
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Best Wrestling Shoes Out there!
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying these shoes. They last all season and then off season too. Grip is great these are the only shoes he’ll wrestle in. And with this season record he’s 19-1 these shoes are golden. Great fit and the laces stay with the help of the Velcro flap.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer ”Harvesting Life’s Lessons”

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe well built and lasts
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size I am glad I didn't go one size up. My son has an 8.5 shoe which is a little big so he can grow into it so I ordered a size 8 and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: malpage

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I son is raving about how well it’s holding up. Looks and feels good. Quality is great. Recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: T. K. Salonitis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Son uses for wrestling. Great quality and great fit. Easy to unlace and that was our downfall of his last year shoes. We ordered a 5.5 and they fit as expected. ASICS is such a good brad to buy from
customer_reviews.author: Claire Tsuji

customer_reviews.title: The size chart is completely different!
customer_reviews.text: This seller does not have the same size and is charged $ 15 for a refund! Size 40 is real 42 !
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Freshman Wrestler and he's had 2 pair of these and they are excellent shoes with top notch grip.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great for a larger foot.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for. My son loves them and is a size 14

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. It’s hard to find them large enough for him and these for perfectly. Not too tight on the toes either.

customer_reviews.title: great shoe, looks great and will hold up a full season.
customer_reviews.text: jb's always run a hair small. buy a half size bigger than u think u wear. great quality, will last a full season.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as expected. Great quality and love the look.

customer_reviews.title: The shoes run small.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe, reasonably priced. My daughter is a size 6 in woman's and ordered a 4 because they are men's size. They fit way too small. I will have to send them back and hope one size bigger fits.
customer_reviews.author: austinie cazares

customer_reviews.title: True to size, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. He said they are super comfortable, flexible and very light.

customer_reviews.title: Great style and excellent fit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wrestling shoes. Ordered 9.5 for my son he said they fit perfectly snug just as wrestling shoes should fit.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Get one size up though. There suppose to fit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Writerchick

customer_reviews.title: Love these wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes, a Mr. Clean magic eraser gets off any mat marks.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Blast'Em
customer_reviews.text: Great feel on the mat then any other wrestling shoe. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: These were for for my son. He wears a 15. Glad these were available in the bigger sizes! He really likes them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for wrestling shoes..could use a bit of padding, but as a rule...wrestling shoes do not have that...so wasn't expected anyway
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and durable
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love them and they look good on him.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mance

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Wear like they are broken in right out of the box! Flexible split foot pad - they really stick well too! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them. He only wears this brand because of the grip and they are nice looking
customer_reviews.author: amanda arbizo

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, my son wears them 6 days a week between practice and matches. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: amy blum

customer_reviews.title: THESE SHOES RUN SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: How sad to do all the research and order 1 size larger and they are still too small.
customer_reviews.author: charis riner

customer_reviews.title: Easy Return & Exchange
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was beautiful and delivered promptly but I had ordered the wrong size but return/exchange was quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with these
customer_reviews.text: They came scuffed before he even wore them. Laces don't pull as tight as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Mattessich

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes for my son he loves them....says he wishes he could wear them all day most comfortable shoes he has;) fit tts
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, they just run small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. They are great shoes. Pick a size or two larger than normal shoes if you plan to some growing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Smelzer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money and time on these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I even ordered them 2 sizes larger and the shoes came 3 sizes smaller than my actual shoe size..wow..👏 (don't buy)
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and the best shoe for wrestling. Comfortable, very good looking, they show no laces. What more can I ask for

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: They fit as we had hoped they would. Son says they are comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: For wrestling and workout
customer_reviews.text: Very good but with time it can degrade a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son was very happy
customer_reviews.text: They was perched for my son and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS - Mens Matflex 6 Shoes
product_meta.description: Follow in the footsteps of US wrestling star Jordan Burroughs with the JB ELITE IV unisex wrestling shoe from ASICS. Inspired by the World Championship-winning athlete, the footwear is designed to both look good and support you every step of the way as you do battle in the ring.
feature_bullets: Take the mat with the Jordan Burroughs signature wresting shoe: the ASICS® JB Elite IV.
Breathable mesh uppers in a supportive, hi-top silhouette.
Synthetic overlay throughout upper provides added durability in high-stress areas.
Lace-up closure provides a custom fit.

Hook-and-loop closure at tongue for securing laces. Split, rubber outsole for added durability and dexterity. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8.9 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
